request.description: Get request to obatain the list of existing similarity tables
Creates in the database the simlarity table and their entries
GET Request to retrieve knowledge of an application in this case with ID 10

POST request to discover similar non-functional applications, given the Workload
and Performance Characteristics depicted in the XML document sent in the body

POST Request to persist the knowledge of the application depicted in the XML
sent in the  body

POST Request to persist the knowledge of the application depicted in the XML
sent in the  body

POST Request to persist the knowledge of the application depicted in the XML
sent in the  body

POST Request to persist the knowledge of the application depicted in the XML
sent in the  body

POST Request to persist the knowledge of the application depicted in the XML
sent in the  body

POST Request to persist the knowledge of the application depicted in the XML
sent in the  body

PUT Request to modify the similarity value of entries of a similarity table given 
the Table ID, the column, row and similarity value depicted in the body
as XML

PUT Request to modify the similarity value of entries of a similarity table given 
the Table ID, the column, row and similarity value depicted in the body
as XML

PUT request that updates the non functional characteristics of the application 
depicted in the body of the request

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<AlphaTopologyTemplate>
  <specificationType>xml</specificationType>
  <specification>
    <tosca:Definitions xmlns:tosca="http://docs.oasis-open.org/tosca/ns/2011/12" xmlns:ns0="http://www.eclipse.org/winery/model/selfservice" xmlns:winery="http://www.opentosca.org/winery/extensions/tosca/2013/02/12">
      <tosca:ServiceTemplate id="test" name="test" targetNamespace="http://www.eclipse.org/winery/model/selfservice">
        <tosca:TopologyTemplate xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/tosca/ns/2011/12" xmlns:winery="http://www.opentosca.org/winery/extensions/tosca/2013/02/12">
          <tosca:NodeTemplate id="MediaWiki_WebApp" name="AlphaMediaWiki" type="ns0:MediaWiki_WebApp" winery:x="577" winery:y="23" />
          <tosca:NodeTemplate id="MediaWikiPHP_App" name="AlphaPHP_App" type="ns0:MediaWikiPHP_App" winery:x="301" winery:y="139" />
          <tosca:NodeTemplate id="WikiDB_MySQLDB" name="AlphaWikiDB_MySQL" type="ns0:WikiDB_MySQLDB" winery:x="841" winery:y="144" />
          <tosca:RelationshipTemplate id="con_28" name="con_28" type="winery:ConsistsOf">
            <tosca:SourceElement ref="MediaWiki_WebApp" />
            <tosca:TargetElement ref="MediaWikiPHP_App" />
          </tosca:RelationshipTemplate>
          <tosca:RelationshipTemplate id="con_40" name="con_40" type="winery:ConsistsOf">
            <tosca:SourceElement ref="MediaWiki_WebApp" />
            <tosca:TargetElement ref="WikiDB_MySQLDB" />
          </tosca:RelationshipTemplate>
        </tosca:TopologyTemplate>
      </tosca:ServiceTemplate>
    </tosca:Definitions>
  </specification>
  <nodelevel>
    <node id="MediaWiki_WebApp">
      <level>root</level>
    </node>
    <node id="MediaWikiPHP_App">
      <level>leaf</level>
    </node>
    <node id="WikiDB_MySQLDB">
      <level>leaf</level>
    </node>
  </nodelevel>
</AlphaTopologyTemplate>

request.description: Request to store in PERTOS the depicted alpha topology

This requests returns the list of topologies thatare similar to the one identified 
by the ID sent as part of the requirement

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<TopologyTemplate xmlns="http://docs.oasis-open.org/tosca/ns/2011/12" xmlns:winery="http://www.opentosca.org/winery/extensions/tosca/2013/02/12">
  <NodeTemplate id="MediaWiki_WebApp" name="AlphaMediaWiki" xmlns:ty="http://www.eclipse.org/winery/model/selfservice" type="ty:MediaWiki_WebApp" winery:x="577" winery:y="23" />
  <NodeTemplate id="MediaWikiPHP_App" name="AlphaPHP_App" xmlns:ty="http://www.eclipse.org/winery/model/selfservice" type="ty:MediaWikiPHP_App" winery:x="301" winery:y="139" />
  <NodeTemplate id="WikiDB_MySQLDB" name="AlphaWikiDB_MySQL" xmlns:ty="http://www.eclipse.org/winery/model/selfservice" type="ty:WikiDB_MySQLDB" winery:x="841" winery:y="144" />
  <NodeTemplate id="ApachePHPModule" name="ApachePHPModule" xmlns:ty="http://www.eclipse.org/winery/model/selfservice" type="ty:ApachePHPModule" winery:x="243" winery:y="239" />
  <NodeTemplate id="ApacheWebserver" name="ApacheWebserver" xmlns:ty="http://www.eclipse.org/winery/model/selfservice" type="ty:ApacheWebserver" winery:x="224" winery:y="362" />
  <NodeTemplate id="UbuntuVM" name="UbuntuVM" xmlns:ty="http://www.eclipse.org/winery/model/selfservice" type="ty:UbuntuVM" winery:x="217" winery:y="482" />
  <NodeTemplate id="AmazonEC2" name="AmazonEC2" xmlns:ty="http://www.eclipse.org/winery/model/selfservice" type="ty:AmazonEC2" winery:x="206" winery:y="610" />
  <NodeTemplate id="MySQLServer" name="MySQLServer" xmlns:ty="http://www.eclipse.org/winery/model/selfservice" type="ty:MySQLServer" winery:x="755" winery:y="461" />
  <RelationshipTemplate id="con_28" name="con_28" xmlns:ty="http://www.opentosca.org/winery/extensions/tosca/2013/02/12" type="ty:ConsistsOf">
    <SourceElement ref="MediaWiki_WebApp" />
    <TargetElement ref="MediaWikiPHP_App" />
  </RelationshipTemplate>
  <RelationshipTemplate id="con_40" name="con_40" xmlns:ty="http://www.opentosca.org/winery/extensions/tosca/2013/02/12" type="ty:ConsistsOf">
    <SourceElement ref="MediaWiki_WebApp" />
    <TargetElement ref="WikiDB_MySQLDB" />
  </RelationshipTemplate>
  <RelationshipTemplate id="con_40" name="con_40" xmlns:ty="http://www.opentosca.org/winery/extensions/tosca/2013/02/12" type="ty:InteractsWith">
    <SourceElement ref="MediaWikiPHP_App" />
    <TargetElement ref="WikiDB_MySQLDB" />
  </RelationshipTemplate>
  <RelationshipTemplate id="con_94" name="con_94" xmlns:ty="http://www.opentosca.org/winery/extensions/tosca/2013/02/12" type="ty:HostedOn">
    <SourceElement ref="MediaWikiPHP_App" />
    <TargetElement ref="ApachePHPModule" />
  </RelationshipTemplate>
  <RelationshipTemplate id="con_106" name="con_106" xmlns:ty="http://www.opentosca.org/winery/extensions/tosca/2013/02/12" type="ty:HostedOn">
    <SourceElement ref="ApachePHPModule" />
    <TargetElement ref="ApacheWebserver" />
  </RelationshipTemplate>
  <RelationshipTemplate id="con_118" name="con_118" xmlns:ty="http://www.opentosca.org/winery/extensions/tosca/2013/02/12" type="ty:HostedOn">
    <SourceElement ref="ApacheWebserver" />
    <TargetElement ref="UbuntuVM" />
  </RelationshipTemplate>
  <RelationshipTemplate id="con_130" name="con_130" xmlns:ty="http://www.opentosca.org/winery/extensions/tosca/2013/02/12" type="ty:HostedOn">
    <SourceElement ref="UbuntuVM" />
    <TargetElement ref="AmazonEC2" />
  </RelationshipTemplate>
  <RelationshipTemplate id="con_142" name="con_142" xmlns:ty="http://www.opentosca.org/winery/extensions/tosca/2013/02/12" type="ty:HostedOn">
    <SourceElement ref="WikiDB_MySQLDB" />
    <TargetElement ref="MySQLServer" />
  </RelationshipTemplate>
  <RelationshipTemplate id="con_154" name="con_154" xmlns:ty="http://www.opentosca.org/winery/extensions/tosca/2013/02/12" type="ty:HostedOn">
    <SourceElement ref="MySQLServer" />
    <TargetElement ref="UbuntuVM" />
  </RelationshipTemplate>
</TopologyTemplate>

request.description:
Stores the  service template of a mu topology in Winery of an entry 
previously created with the name and namespace (check request create Topology Winery)
This request creates a new topology in winery given a name and a namesapce
